tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SocialMediaMentions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_text TEXT,
    mention_date TIMESTAMP,
    mentioned_competitor TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE competitors_mentions (
    mention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    mention_text TEXT,
    mention_date TIMESTAMP,
    mention_source VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    performance_rating FLOAT,
    performance_date TIMESTAMP,
    performance_source VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_topic VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_date TIMESTAMP,
    trend_source VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE mentions (
  mention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  competitor_id INT,
  mention_date DATE NOT NULL,
  mention_content TEXT,
  mention_source VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE engagements (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mention_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  engagement_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  engagement_date DATE
);
